alfredsnippet.snippet:
# !/bin/zsh
# covert video to mp4 and copy the creation time to the new file
# create a folder name 'render' on the same level as the original file, if it doesn't exist
inputFile="{clipboard}"
mediaDir=$(dirname "$inputFile")
mediaName=$(basename "$inputFile")
mediaName="${mediaName%.*}"
renderDir="$mediaDir/render"
mkdir -p "$renderDir"  
ffmpeg -i "$inputFile" -c copy "$renderDir/$mediaName-opt.mp4" 
touch -r "$inputFile" "$renderDir/$mediaName-opt.mp4"
alfredsnippet.name: optmp4
